channel.title: Wyre on News Lancashire
channel.description: Recent content in Wyre on News Lancashire

item.title: Misery for drivers as A6 Garstang Road gas works delays set to last another eight weeks
item.description: Drivers face nearly two more months of disruption after roadworks causing long delays on the A6 Garstang Road are set to continue until April. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Poulton-le-Fylde man jailed after police find cocaine and heroin in drugs raid
item.description: A Poulton-le-Fylde man has been jailed for five years after police found cocaine and heroin during a drugs warrant at his home. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Blackpool North and Fleetwood MP backs tighter restrictions on dog breeding after influx of concerns
item.description: A Fylde coast MP has joined calls to improve the breeding standards for dogs and an end to the misery caused by extreme breeding. Source: Blackpool Gazette

item.title: E-bike rider left critically injured after crashing into parked car in Fleetwood
item.description: A man remains in a critical condition after an e-bike collision in Fleetwood. Source: Blackpool Gazette

item.title: We cannot lose this play area and Multi Use Games Amenity in Fleetwood, says councillor
item.description: The future of a much-used childrenâ€™s play area and multi use games area (MUGA) in Fleetwood is at risk, a councillor is warning. Source: Blackpool Gazette
